title: Bootstrap Button Groups
subject: Bootstrap
theory:
## Combining Actions
Button groups allow you to stack multiple buttons together on a single line.

### Basic Group
Wrap buttons in `.btn-group`.

### Vertical Group
Use `.btn-group-vertical` to stack them vertically.

### Toolbar
Combine sets of button groups into a `.btn-toolbar` for complex toolbars.

examples.explanation: Useful for sidebar menus or option pickers.

summary: Button groups create cohesive control sets.
